Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

13 namespace Kassiopeia
14 {
15  KSROOTTrackPainter::KSROOTTrackPainter() :
16  fPath( "" ),
17  fBase( "" ),
18  fXAxis( "z" ),
19  fYAxis( "y" ),
20  fStepOutputGroupName( "output_step_world" ),
21  fPositionName( "position" ),
22  fTrackOutputGroupName( "output_track_world" ),
23  fColorVariable( "color_variable" ),
24  fColorMode( eColorFix ),
25  fColorPalette( eColorDefault ),
26  fDrawOptions( "" ),
27  fPlotMode( ePlotStep ),
28  fAxialMirror( false ),
29  fMultigraph(),
30  fBaseColors(),
31  fColorVector()
32  {
33  }
34  KSROOTTrackPainter::~KSROOTTrackPainter()
35  {
36  }
37 
38  void KSROOTTrackPainter::Render()
39  {
40  CreateColors();
41  vector<Color_t>::iterator tColorIterator = fColorVector.begin();
42 
43  fMultigraph = new TMultiGraph();
44 
45  KRootFile* tRootFile = KRootFile::CreateOutputRootFile( fBase );
46  if( !fPath.empty() )
47  {
48  tRootFile->AddToPaths( fPath );
49  }
50 
51  KSReadFileROOT tReader;
52  if (! tReader.TryFile( tRootFile ))
53  {
54  vismsg( eWarning ) << "Could not open file <" << tRootFile->GetName() << ">" << eom;
55  return;
56  }
57 
58  tReader.OpenFile( tRootFile );
59 
60  KSReadRunROOT& tRunReader = tReader.GetRun();
61  KSReadEventROOT& tEventReader = tReader.GetEvent();
62  KSReadTrackROOT& tTrackReader = tReader.GetTrack();
63  KSReadStepROOT& tStepReader = tReader.GetStep();
64 
65  if ( fPlotMode == ePlotStep )
66  {
67  KSReadObjectROOT& tStepGroup = tStepReader.GetObject( fStepOutputGroupName );
68  KSThreeVector& tPosition = tStepGroup.Get< KSThreeVector >( fPositionName );
69 
70  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
71  {
72  vismsg( eDebug ) << "Analyzing run <" << tRunReader.GetRunIndex() << "> with events from <" << tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex() << "> to <"<<tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex()<<">"<< eom;
73  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
74  {
75  vismsg( eDebug ) << "Analyzing event <" << tEventReader.GetEventIndex() << "> with tracks from <" << tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex() << "> to <"<<tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex()<<">"<< eom;
76  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
77  {
78  vismsg( eDebug ) << "Analyzing track <" << tTrackReader.GetTrackIndex() << "> with steps from <" << tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex() << "> to <"<<tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex()<<">"<< eom;
79  TGraph* myGraph = NULL;
80  if ( fColorMode == eColorTrack || fColorMode == eColorFix )
81  {
82  myGraph = new TGraph();
83  if ( tColorIterator == fColorVector.end() )
84  {
85  vismsg( eError ) <<"color vector has to less entries, something is wrong!"<<eom;
86  }
87  myGraph->SetLineColor( *tColorIterator );
88  tColorIterator++;
89  }
90 
91  for( tStepReader = tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex(); tStepReader <= tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepReader++ )
92  {
93  if( tStepGroup.Valid() )
94  {
95  double tXValue = 0.;
96  if( fXAxis == string( "x" ) || fXAxis == string( "X" ) )
97  {
98  tXValue = tPosition.Value().X();
99  }
100  if( fXAxis == string( "y" ) || fXAxis == string( "Y" ) )
101  {
102  tXValue = tPosition.Value().Y();
103  }
104  if( fXAxis == string( "z" ) || fXAxis == string( "Z" ) )
105  {
106  tXValue = tPosition.Value().Z();
107  }
108  double tYValue = 0.;
109  if( fYAxis == string( "x" ) || fYAxis == string( "X" ) )
110  {
111  tYValue = tPosition.Value().X();
112  }
113  if( fYAxis == string( "y" ) || fYAxis == string( "Y" ) )
114  {
115  tYValue = tPosition.Value().Y();
116  }
117  if( fYAxis == string( "z" ) || fYAxis == string( "Z" ) )
118  {
119  tYValue = tPosition.Value().Z();
120  }
121  if( fYAxis == string( "r" ) || fYAxis == string( "R" ) )
122  {
123  tYValue = tPosition.Value().Perp();
124  }
125 
126  if ( fColorMode == eColorStep )
127  {
128  //create one graph for each point (one graph can only have one color)
129  myGraph = new TGraph();
130  myGraph->SetPoint( myGraph->GetN(), tXValue, tYValue );
131  if ( tColorIterator == fColorVector.end() )
132  {
133  vismsg( eError ) <<"color vector has to less entries, something is wrong!"<<eom;
134  }
135  myGraph->SetMarkerColor( *tColorIterator );
136  fMultigraph->Add( myGraph );
137  tColorIterator++;
138  }
139  if ( fColorMode == eColorTrack || fColorMode == eColorFix )
140  {
141  myGraph->SetPoint( myGraph->GetN(), tXValue, tYValue );
142  }
143  }
144  }
145 
146  if ( fColorMode == eColorTrack || fColorMode == eColorFix )
147  {
148  fMultigraph->Add( myGraph );
149 
150  //if axial mirror is set, another graph is created with the same points, put y has a changed sign
151  if ( fAxialMirror )
152  {
153  TGraph* myMirroredGraph = new TGraph();
154  myMirroredGraph->SetLineColor( myGraph->GetLineColor() );
155  double tX,tY;
156  for ( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < myGraph->GetN(); tIndex++ )
157  {
158  myGraph->GetPoint( tIndex, tX, tY );
159  myMirroredGraph->SetPoint( tIndex, tX, -1.0*tY );
160  }
161  fMultigraph->Add( myMirroredGraph );
162  }
163  }
164  }
165  }
166  }
167  }
168 
169  if ( fPlotMode == ePlotTrack )
170  {
171  KSReadObjectROOT& tTrackGroup = tTrackReader.GetObject( fTrackOutputGroupName );
172  KSThreeVector& tPosition = tTrackGroup.Get< KSThreeVector >( fPositionName );
173  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
174  {
175  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
176  {
177 
178  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
179  {
180  TGraph* myGraph;
181  myGraph = new TGraph();
182 
183  if ( fColorMode == eColorTrack || fColorMode == eColorFix )
184  {
185  if ( tColorIterator == fColorVector.end() )
186  {
187  vismsg( eError ) <<"color vector has to less entries, something is wrong!"<<eom;
188  }
189  myGraph->SetMarkerColor( *tColorIterator );
190  tColorIterator++;
191  }
192 
193  double tXValue = 0.;
194  if( fXAxis == string( "x" ) || fXAxis == string( "X" ) )
195  {
196  tXValue = tPosition.Value().X();
197  }
198  if( fXAxis == string( "y" ) || fXAxis == string( "Y" ) )
199  {
200  tXValue = tPosition.Value().Y();
201  }
202  if( fXAxis == string( "z" ) || fXAxis == string( "Z" ) )
203  {
204  tXValue = tPosition.Value().Z();
205  }
206  double tYValue = 0.;
207  if( fYAxis == string( "x" ) || fYAxis == string( "X" ) )
208  {
209  tYValue = tPosition.Value().X();
210  }
211  if( fYAxis == string( "y" ) || fYAxis == string( "Y" ) )
212  {
213  tYValue = tPosition.Value().Y();
214  }
215  if( fYAxis == string( "z" ) || fYAxis == string( "Z" ) )
216  {
217  tYValue = tPosition.Value().Z();
218  }
219  if( fYAxis == string( "r" ) || fYAxis == string( "R" ) )
220  {
221  tYValue = tPosition.Value().Perp();
222  }
223 
224  myGraph->SetPoint( myGraph->GetN(), tXValue, tYValue );
225  fMultigraph->Add( myGraph );
226  }
227 
228  }
229  }
230  }
231 
232  tReader.CloseFile();
233  delete tRootFile;
234 
235  return;
236  }
237 
238  void KSROOTTrackPainter::Display()
239  {
240  if( fDisplayEnabled == true )
241  {
242  if ( fPlotMode == ePlotStep )
243  {
244  if ( fColorMode == eColorStep )
245  {
246  fMultigraph->Draw( ( string("P") + fDrawOptions ).c_str() );
247  }
248  else
249  {
250  fMultigraph->Draw( ( string("L") + fDrawOptions ).c_str() );
251  }
252  }
253  if ( fPlotMode == ePlotTrack )
254  {
255  fMultigraph->Draw( ( string("P") + fDrawOptions ).c_str() );
256  }
257  }
258 
259  return;
260  }
261 
262  void KSROOTTrackPainter::Write()
263  {
264  if( fWriteEnabled == true )
265  {
266  return;
267  }
268  return;
269  }
270 
271  void KSROOTTrackPainter::CreateColors()
272  {
273  KRootFile* tRootFile = KRootFile::CreateOutputRootFile( fBase );
274  if( !fPath.empty() )
275  {
276  tRootFile->AddToPaths( fPath );
277  }
278 
279  KSReadFileROOT tReader;
280  tReader.OpenFile( tRootFile );
281 
282  KSReadRunROOT& tRunReader = tReader.GetRun();
283  KSReadEventROOT& tEventReader = tReader.GetEvent();
284  KSReadTrackROOT& tTrackReader = tReader.GetTrack();
285  KSReadStepROOT& tStepReader = tReader.GetStep();
286 
287  //getting number of tracks/steps in file
288  size_t tNumberOfTracks = 0;
289  size_t tNumberOfSteps = 0;
290  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
291  {
292  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
293  {
294  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
295  {
296  tNumberOfTracks++;
297 
298  for( tStepReader = tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex(); tStepReader <= tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepReader++ )
299  {
300  tNumberOfSteps++;
301  }
302  }
303  }
304  }
305 
306  if ( fColorPalette == eColorFPDRings )
307  {
308  while ( ( fColorVector.size() < tNumberOfTracks && fColorMode == eColorTrack )
309  || ( fColorVector.size() < tNumberOfSteps && fColorMode == eColorStep ) )
310  {
311  //rainbow scheme
312  fColorVector.push_back( kBlack );
313  fColorVector.push_back( kViolet + 7 );
314  fColorVector.push_back( kBlue + 2 );
315  fColorVector.push_back( kAzure + 2 );
316  fColorVector.push_back( kAzure + 10 );
317  fColorVector.push_back( kTeal + 7 );
318  fColorVector.push_back( kGreen + 1);
319  fColorVector.push_back( kSpring - 3 );
320  fColorVector.push_back( kSpring + 10 );
321  fColorVector.push_back( kYellow );
322  fColorVector.push_back( kOrange - 3 );
323  fColorVector.push_back( kOrange + 7 );
324  fColorVector.push_back( kRed );
325  fColorVector.push_back( kRed + 2);
326  }
327  }
328 
329 
330  if ( fColorMode == eColorFix )
331  {
332  Color_t tFixColor(kRed);
333  if ( fBaseColors.size() > 0 )
334  {
335  TColor tTempColor;
336  tFixColor = tTempColor.GetColor(fBaseColors.at(0).first.GetRed(),fBaseColors.at(0).first.GetGreen(),fBaseColors.at(0).first.GetBlue());
337  }
338  while ( fColorVector.size() < tNumberOfTracks )
339  {
340  fColorVector.push_back( tFixColor );
341  }
342  }
343 
344 
345 
346  if ( fColorPalette == eColorCustom || fColorPalette == eColorDefault )
347  {
348 
349  int tColorBins=100;
350  size_t tNumberBaseColors = fBaseColors.size();
351 
352  double tRed[tNumberBaseColors];
353  double tGreen[tNumberBaseColors];
354  double tBlue[tNumberBaseColors];
355  double tFraction[tNumberBaseColors];
356 
357  for ( size_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tNumberBaseColors; tIndex++ )
358  {
359  tRed[tIndex] = fBaseColors.at( tIndex ).first.GetRed();
360  tGreen[tIndex] = fBaseColors.at( tIndex ).first.GetGreen();
361  tBlue[tIndex] = fBaseColors.at( tIndex ).first.GetBlue();
362  tFraction[tIndex] = fBaseColors.at( tIndex ).second;
363  if ( tFraction[tIndex] == -1.0 )
364  {
365  tFraction[tIndex] = tIndex / (double)(tNumberBaseColors - 1);
366  }
367  }
368 
369  int tMinColor = TColor::CreateGradientColorTable(tNumberBaseColors,tFraction,tRed,tGreen,tBlue,tColorBins);
370  int tMaxColor = tMinColor + tColorBins - 1;
371 
372  if ( fColorPalette == eColorDefault )
373  {
374  tMinColor = 51; //purple
375  tMaxColor = 100; //red
376  }
377 
378  // int tPalette[tColorBins];
379  // for ( int i = 0; i<tColorBins; i++)
380  // {
381  // tPalette[i] = tMinColor + i;
382  // }
383  // gStyle->SetPalette( tColorBins, tPalette );
384 
385 
386  double tColorVariableMax( -1.0 * std::numeric_limits< double >::max());
387  double tColorVariableMin( std::numeric_limits< double >::max());
388 
389  if ( fColorMode == eColorTrack )
390  {
391  if ( tNumberOfTracks == 1 )
392  {
393  fColorVector.push_back( tMaxColor );
394  return;
395  }
396  //get track group and color variable
397  KSReadObjectROOT& tTrackGroup = tTrackReader.GetObject( fTrackOutputGroupName );
398 
399 
400  //find min and max of color variable
401  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
402  {
403  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
404  {
405  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
406  {
407  double tColorVariable = 0.;
408  if ( tTrackGroup.Exists< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ) )
409  {
410  tColorVariable = tTrackGroup.Get< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ).Value();
411  }
412  else if ( tTrackGroup.Exists< KSInt >( fColorVariable ) )
413  {
414  tColorVariable = tTrackGroup.Get< KSInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
415  }
416  else if ( tTrackGroup.Exists< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ) )
417  {
418  tColorVariable = tTrackGroup.Get< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
419  }
420  else
421  {
422  vismsg( eError ) <<"Color variable is of unsupported type"<<eom;
423  }
424 
425 
426  if ( tColorVariable > tColorVariableMax )
427  {
428  tColorVariableMax = tColorVariable;
429  }
430  if ( tColorVariable < tColorVariableMin )
431  {
432  tColorVariableMin = tColorVariable;
433  }
434  }
435  }
436  }
437  vismsg( eNormal ) << "Range of track color variable is from < "<<tColorVariableMin <<" > to < "<<tColorVariableMax<<" >"<<eom;
438 
439  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
440  {
441  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
442  {
443  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
444  {
445  double tColorVariable = 0.;
446  if ( tTrackGroup.Exists< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ) )
447  {
448  tColorVariable = tTrackGroup.Get< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ).Value();
449  }
450  else if ( tTrackGroup.Exists< KSInt >( fColorVariable ) )
451  {
452  tColorVariable = tTrackGroup.Get< KSInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
453  }
454  else if ( tTrackGroup.Exists< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ) )
455  {
456  tColorVariable = tTrackGroup.Get< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
457  }
458  else
459  {
460  vismsg( eError ) <<"Color variable is of unsupported type"<<eom;
461  }
462  double tCurrentColor = tMinColor+((tMaxColor-tMinColor)*(tColorVariable-tColorVariableMin)/(tColorVariableMax-tColorVariableMin));
463  fColorVector.push_back( tCurrentColor );
464  }
465  }
466  }
467  }
468 
469 
470  if ( fColorMode == eColorStep )
471  {
472  //get step group and color variable
473  KSReadObjectROOT& tStepGroup = tStepReader.GetObject( fStepOutputGroupName );
474 
475  //find min and max of color variable
476  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
477  {
478  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
479  {
480  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
481  {
482  for( tStepReader = tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex(); tStepReader <= tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepReader++ )
483  {
484  if ( tStepGroup.Valid() )
485  {
486  double tColorVariable = 0.;
487  if ( tStepGroup.Exists< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ) )
488  {
489  tColorVariable = tStepGroup.Get< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ).Value();
490  }
491  else if ( tStepGroup.Exists< KSInt >( fColorVariable ) )
492  {
493  tColorVariable = tStepGroup.Get< KSInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
494  }
495  else if ( tStepGroup.Exists< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ) )
496  {
497  tColorVariable = tStepGroup.Get< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
498  }
499  else
500  {
501  vismsg( eError ) <<"Color variable is of unsupported type"<<eom;
502  }
503 
504  if ( tColorVariable > tColorVariableMax )
505  {
506  tColorVariableMax = tColorVariable;
507  }
508  if ( tColorVariable < tColorVariableMin )
509  {
510  tColorVariableMin = tColorVariable;
511  }
512  }
513  }
514  }
515  }
516  }
517 
518  vismsg( eNormal ) << "Range of step color variable is from < "<<tColorVariableMin <<" > to < "<<tColorVariableMax<<" >"<<eom;
519 
520  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
521  {
522  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
523  {
524  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
525  {
526  for( tStepReader = tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex(); tStepReader <= tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepReader++ )
527  {
528  if ( tStepGroup.Valid() )
529  {
530  double tColorVariable = 0.;
531  if ( tStepGroup.Exists< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ) )
532  {
533  tColorVariable = tStepGroup.Get< KSDouble >( fColorVariable ).Value();
534  }
535  else if ( tStepGroup.Exists< KSInt >( fColorVariable ) )
536  {
537  tColorVariable = tStepGroup.Get< KSInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
538  }
539  else if ( tStepGroup.Exists< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ) )
540  {
541  tColorVariable = tStepGroup.Get< KSUInt >( fColorVariable ).Value();
542  }
543  else
544  {
545  vismsg( eError ) <<"Color variable is of unsupported type"<<eom;
546  }
547  double tCurrentColor = tMinColor+((tMaxColor-tMinColor)*(tColorVariable-tColorVariableMin)/(tColorVariableMax-tColorVariableMin));
548  fColorVector.push_back( tCurrentColor );
549  }
550  }
551  }
552  }
553  }
554  }
555  }
556  tReader.CloseFile();
557  delete tRootFile;
558 
559  }
560 
561  double KSROOTTrackPainter::GetXMin()
562  {
563  double tMin( std::numeric_limits< double >::max() );
564  TList* tGraphList = fMultigraph->GetListOfGraphs();
565  for ( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tGraphList->GetSize(); tIndex++ )
566  {
567  TGraph* tGraph = dynamic_cast<TGraph*> ( tGraphList->At( tIndex ) );
568  double* tX = tGraph->GetX();
569  for ( int tIndexArray = 0; tIndexArray < tGraph->GetN(); tIndexArray++ )
570  {
571  if ( tX[tIndexArray] < tMin )
572  {
573  tMin = tX[tIndexArray];
574  }
575  }
576  }
577  return tMin;
578  }
579  double KSROOTTrackPainter::GetXMax()
580  {
581  double tMax( -1.0 * std::numeric_limits< double >::max() );
582  TList* tGraphList = fMultigraph->GetListOfGraphs();
583  for ( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tGraphList->GetSize(); tIndex++ )
584  {
585  TGraph* tGraph = dynamic_cast<TGraph*> ( tGraphList->At( tIndex ) );
586  double* tX = tGraph->GetX();
587  for ( int tIndexArray = 0; tIndexArray < tGraph->GetN(); tIndexArray++ )
588  {
589  if ( tX[tIndexArray] > tMax )
590  {
591  tMax = tX[tIndexArray];
592  }
593  }
594  }
595  return tMax;
596  }
597 
598  double KSROOTTrackPainter::GetYMin()
599  {
600  double tMin( std::numeric_limits< double >::max() );
601  TList* tGraphList = fMultigraph->GetListOfGraphs();
602  for ( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tGraphList->GetSize(); tIndex++ )
603  {
604  TGraph* tGraph = dynamic_cast<TGraph*> ( tGraphList->At( tIndex ) );
605  double* tY = tGraph->GetY();
606  for ( int tIndexArray = 0; tIndexArray < tGraph->GetN(); tIndexArray++ )
607  {
608  if ( tY[tIndexArray] < tMin )
609  {
610  tMin = tY[tIndexArray];
611  }
612  }
613  }
614  return tMin;
615  }
616  double KSROOTTrackPainter::GetYMax()
617  {
618  double tMax( -1.0 * std::numeric_limits< double >::max() );
619  TList* tGraphList = fMultigraph->GetListOfGraphs();
620  for ( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tGraphList->GetSize(); tIndex++ )
621  {
622  TGraph* tGraph = dynamic_cast<TGraph*> ( tGraphList->At( tIndex ) );
623  double* tY = tGraph->GetY();
624  for ( int tIndexArray = 0; tIndexArray < tGraph->GetN(); tIndexArray++ )
625  {
626  if ( tY[tIndexArray] > tMax )
627  {
628  tMax = tY[tIndexArray];
629  }
630  }
631  }
632  return tMax;
633  }
